about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what happens up there in the Red laboratory?
For years the head of the family had been working on his secret project, a formula for scouring the world with true horror.
To transform the Reds… into monstrous creatures!
But the fire of hope never stops burning: The fight to regain the humanity of them all has just begun.
Choose your Red and pepare to battle!

Redrum is a 1v1 arcade party game.
During Halloween night, the Reds were transformed into horrific creatures with peculiar powers.
The clashes take place inside the rooms of Red Manior, which will become real arenas in the clashes between the 16 members of the Red family.
Fight until the last second as you try to collect (or steal) as many ingredients as possible for the antidote needed to reverse the transformation!
Attack your opponent like hell, or escape with the ingredients and use the environment to hide from him, in this fun game that follows the "easy to learn, hard to perform" philosophy!
